title: Watch This Rescue Dog Show Off PJs for Grandparent Sleepover | Flipboard
text: Watch This Rescue Dog Show Off PJs for Grandparent Sleepover Every Saturday, Goose, a rescued pit bull mix, awaits his special sleepover with his grandad.
